h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Tiger Relic Location
content: The Tiger Relic is found on a platform beneath the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge. To get it, you will need the Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone from the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard in the chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Relic.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Relic', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Tiger Relic Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiger Relic is found on a platform beneath the Crouching Tiger Temple in Yellow Wind Ridge. To get it, you will need the Keeness of Tiger and Sterness of Stone from the Tiger Vanguard and Stone Vanguard in the chapter.
